name: dxreactvssvelte
description: Repo for comparing React.js and Svelte.js in terms of DX and usability.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:svelte && npm run install:react
scripts.build:all: npm run build:svelte && npm run build:react
scripts.start:all: npm run start:svelte && npm run start:react

author: Hampus Gottlieb
